hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Din's Fire# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# and #the Kokiri Sword#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Song of Storms#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #Skulls#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Narrow Path Room Recovery Heart 1

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #4# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Forest Temple#.

LH (Lab).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Iron Boots#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #Goron City#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Spirit Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
